original: de'i 'og tu zhes pa ni bsnyen bkur ba de la yang dag par mnyes par byas pa las bla ma yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes pa ni bsnyen bkur ba de la yang dag par mnyes par byas pa las bla ma yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bla ma la rab tu dad pa dang yang dag mgu ba'i ched du zhes pa'o //

analyzed: tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis so //

analyzed: de'i bar ma chad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod pa lnga la nye par longs spyod pa'i bar ma chad par ro //

original: bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni bla ma brgyud pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa las bla mas thob pa rab tu thob pa'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag de slob ma'i ched du bstan par bya'o //

original: de lta mod kyi rim pa cis she na /

analyzed: mthong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mig 'phrul mthong ba dang reg pa nyid 'gro ba rtag tu sgyu ma ji bzhin pa de bzhin du thams cad kyi tshe 'gro ba yang gzugs dang reg pa la sogs pa sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis yongs su

original: zhes gnas so //
analyzed: zhes gnas so //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: stong pa nyid bzhi'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: stong pa nyid bzhi'i bdag nyid can //
translated: he is of the nature of the four emptinesses.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi ngo bo bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ste mngon par te thams cad las yang dag rtogs par bya'o zhes pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi ngo bo bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ste mngon par te thams cad las yang dag rtogs par bya'o zhes pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The fourth stage, the clear realization of the manifest, is the essence of Vajrasattva itself.  The clear realization of the manifest is perfect enlightenment, clear light.

original: de so sor rtogs par byed pa'i rim pa ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes pa'i rim pa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de so sor rtogs par byed pa'i rim pa ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes pa'i rim pa bzhi pa'o //
translated: The stage that brings about the clear realization of that is the fourth stage, the clear realization of the manifest.

original: bshad par bya ni bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad par bya ni bstan par bya'o //
translated: It is to be explained, is to be taught.

original: bdag gis ni klu sgrub kyis so //
analyzed: bdag gis ni klu sgrub kyis so //
translated: By me, by Nagarjuna.

original: de ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje slob dpon dag gi rang bzhin 'di ni rang 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje slob dpon dag gi rang bzhin 'di ni rang 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That is Vajrasattva and the nature of the vajra master.  This is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúSelf-arisen‚Äù and so forth.

original: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med par yongs su shes pa las rang nyid 'byung bar byed do zhes pas rang 'byung ste bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med par yongs su shes pa las rang nyid 'byung bar byed do zhes pas rang 'byung ste bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The self-arisen is the Bhagavan, who is so called because he brings about the arising of himself from the complete knowledge that all things are essenceless.

original: gcig bu nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: gcig bu nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The sole is Vajrasattva.

original: khams gsum rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha ni rdo rje slob dpon te de dang de las rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje slob dpon lhag go //
analyzed: khams gsum rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha ni rdo rje slob dpon te de dang de las rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje slob dpon lhag go //
translated: The Vajra Master is the supreme deity of the three worlds, and Vajrasattva is superior to him.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na man ngag rnams ni rab ster ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde ni yang dag mnyes byas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /üîΩ'dod pa lnga la nyer longs spyod //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na man ngag rnams ni rab ster ba'i phyir ro // de ni yang dag mnyes byas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / 'dod pa lnga la nyer longs spyod //
translated: Why? Because he bestows the esoteric instructions.

original: ces pa'i mthar thug pa ni rtsa ba nyid las rtogs sla bar bshad do //üîΩsnang ba dag ni bskyed par bya /
analyzed: ces pa'i mthar thug pa ni rtsa ba nyid las rtogs sla bar bshad do // snang ba dag ni bskyed par bya /
translated: The root text explains the verse beginning with Having pleased him well up to enjoying the five desires as easy to understand.

original: zhes pa ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum po bskyed cing nyams su myong bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum po bskyed cing nyams su myong bar bya ste /
translated: One should generate the appearances means one should generate and experience the three wisdoms of appearance and so forth.

original: bla la las kyi phyag rgya la'o //
analyzed: bla la las kyi phyag rgya la'o //
translated: In the root text, in the guru means in the action seal, the consort.

original: ci las na snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga las te /
analyzed: ci las na snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga las te /
translated: Why? Because of the rite of union.

original: rdo rje padma 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las zhes pa ni cho ga'i sgra don to //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las zhes pa ni cho ga'i sgra don to //
translated: The meaning of the word rite is that the union of the two organs is preceded by the performance of the vajra and lotus.

original: de bzhin du yang dgongs pa bla na med par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dgongs pa bla na med par gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, it is also said to be the unsurpassed intention.üîΩAttachment, freedom from attachment, and their purification,

original: 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang // de dag par zhes gsum po @188a * //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang // de dag par zhes gsum po @188a * //
translated: these three

original: yang // rdo rje padma 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: yang // rdo rje padma 'dus pa yi //
translated: are the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: dbang po gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor las //
translated: From the union of the two organs,üîΩThe ‚Äúvase, etc.‚Äù

original: zhes so // bum pa la sogs su zhes pa la sogs pa ni byang chub sems ni kun rdzob pa'i'o //
analyzed: zhes so // bum pa la sogs su zhes pa la sogs pa ni byang chub sems ni kun rdzob pa'i'o //
translated: refers to the conventional awakening mind.

original: rab ste dang po nas 'bad pa phul du byung ba las /
analyzed: rab ste dang po nas 'bad pa phul du byung ba las /
translated: The ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù refers to the highest effort from the beginning.

original: bum pa la sogs su legs par bzhag nas te gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs su legs par bzhag nas te gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i don du'o //
translated: Having placed it well in the vase, etc., is for the purpose of conferring the secret empowerment.

original: la sogs kyi sgras padma'i snod dang // su ka ti ka dang dung chos la sogs pa rnams gzung ngo //
analyzed: la sogs kyi sgras padma'i snod dang // su ka ti ka dang dung chos la sogs pa rnams gzung ngo //
translated: The ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the lotus vessel, the sukati flower, the conch, and so on.

original: mtshan phyed na dbang bskur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan phyed na dbang bskur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúAt midnight, confer the empowerment‚Äù and so on.

original: srod la phyogs pa nas brtsams nas mtshan mo'i chu chod bdun pa'i mthar thug pas slob dpon du dbang bskur ba dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba byin nas /
analyzed: srod la phyogs pa nas brtsams nas mtshan mo'i chu chod bdun pa'i mthar thug pas slob dpon du dbang bskur ba dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba byin nas /
translated: Beginning from the time of the evening twilight until the end of the seventh watch of the night, the Master should bestow the consecration of the Master and the secret consecration.

original: snang ba dang po'i ye shes rdo rje nor bu'i rtsa ba ru'o //
analyzed: snang ba dang po'i ye shes rdo rje nor bu'i rtsa ba ru'o //
translated: The intuition of the first appearance is in the root of the vajra gem.

original: de las lhag pa ye shes pa gnyis pa nyams su myong bar byed du bcug nas phyi nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de las lhag pa ye shes pa gnyis pa nyams su myong bar byed du bcug nas phyi nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having caused the experience of the second intuition which is superior to that, he should later bestow the consecration of the intuition of wisdom.

original: slar yang bzhi pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba de yang ngo //
analyzed: slar yang bzhi pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba de yang ngo //
translated: Again, the fourth consecration is the manifest.

original: 'di dag gi nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di dag gi nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo bshad par bya ste /
translated: The nature of the experience of these should be explained.

original: shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba smos pa ni gnyen po snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba smos pa ni gnyen po snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
translated: The mention of the consecration of wisdom is the attainment of the appearance of the antidote.

original: rin po che skyes pa rdo rje nor bu'i dbus su bde ba chen po rig par byed pa brdzun pa'i bag chags kyis gos pa gang yin pa'i ngo bo bla mas mtshan mo'i thun gsum pa'i lhag ma la bstan pa de nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo zhes
analyzed: rin po che skyes pa rdo rje nor bu'i dbus su bde ba chen po rig par byed pa brdzun pa'i bag chags kyis gos pa gang yin pa'i ngo bo bla mas mtshan mo'i thun gsum pa'i lhag ma la bstan pa de nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo zhes
translated: The essence of the experience of the great bliss that is known in the center of the jewel of the male organ, which is covered by the traces of falsity, is the essence that the guru revealed in the remainder of the third period of the night.üîΩ

original: pa ni bshad pa phyogs gcig las so //
analyzed: pa ni bshad pa phyogs gcig las so //
translated: The essence of the experience of that which the guru revealed in the middle of the jewel-man-vajra-gem, which is the great bliss that is the nature of the obscuration of false habitual tendencies, is the one-sided explanation.

original: gzhan bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyogs mngon par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyogs mngon par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The other, the fourth initiation, will be explained from the perspective of the absence of characteristics.

original: shes rab gang la bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba bstan pa'i shes rab de la bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab gang la bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba bstan pa'i shes rab de la bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The wisdom on which the characteristic of self-consecration is experienced is the wisdom to which the fourth initiation is given.

original: 'on kyang bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba nyams su myong ba'i ye shes rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mong gsum pa nyid bzhi par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba nyams su myong ba'i ye shes rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mong gsum pa nyid bzhi par 'gyur ro //
translated: However, the experience of the fourth initiation is the gnosis of the tip of the jewel-vajra, which is the third, that becomes the fourth.

original: shes rab ye shes su ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: shes rab ye shes su ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it the gnosis of wisdom?

original: nor bu'i dbus su so sor rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid nor bu'i rtse mor bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i dbus su so sor rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid nor bu'i rtse mor bsam par bya'o //
translated: That very discerning [mind] in the center of the gem should be imagined at the tip of the gem.

original: tshig tu brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i bde ba 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin bag chags dang bral ba'i ye shes @188b ni dpe can no zhes pa dbang bzhi pa'i don to //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i bde ba 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin bag chags dang bral ba'i ye shes @188b ni dpe can no zhes pa dbang bzhi pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the fourth initiation is that the wisdom free from habitual tendencies, which is the nature of clear light, bliss that is not to be expressed in words, is the exemplified.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i brgya par gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i brgya par gsungs pa /
translated: [It is said] in the one hundred and fifty [stanza] section:

original: yang bag chags dang bcas pa de rnams kyang nyes pa yod pa ma yin te gcig tu skyob par byed pa zhes so //
analyzed: yang bag chags dang bcas pa de rnams kyang nyes pa yod pa ma yin te gcig tu skyob par byed pa zhes so //
translated: Moreover, those [four initiations] along with their habitual tendencies are not faulty, since they are the sole protector.

original: rim pa 'dis dbang bskur bar byed pa rdo rje bla mas slob ma bzang la zhes sbrel lo ;
analyzed: rim pa 'dis dbang bskur bar byed pa rdo rje bla mas slob ma bzang la zhes sbrel lo ;
translated: By this process, the vajra guru who bestows initiation should connect with the good disciple.

original: / dbang bskur yang dag thob nas ni //
analyzed: / dbang bskur yang dag thob nas ni //
translated: Having obtained the perfect initiation,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba rnam bzhi nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo yang dag par thob nas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba rnam bzhi nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo yang dag par thob nas te /
translated: and so forth. Having obtained the perfect experience of the nature of the four initiations,

original: de yang tshig gis so sor bstan par bya ba bshad par bya bzhin pa'i rim pas thob nas so //
analyzed: de yang tshig gis so sor bstan par bya ba bshad par bya bzhin pa'i rim pas thob nas so //
translated: Moreover, having obtained the explanation of the individual words in the order in which they are explained,

original: tho rangs dus su yang ste mtshan mo'i lhag ma la 'od gsal ba'i man ngag gi khyad par slar yang 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: tho rangs dus su yang ste mtshan mo'i lhag ma la 'od gsal ba'i man ngag gi khyad par slar yang 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: at dawn, in the remainder of the night, by the special instruction of clear light, again by the nature of clear light,

original: yang dag mchod nas mnyes bya ste bshad par bya bzhin pa'i bstod pa rnams kyis bla ma la'o //
analyzed: yang dag mchod nas mnyes bya ste bshad par bya bzhin pa'i bstod pa rnams kyis bla ma la'o //
translated: having made perfect offerings, one should please the guru with the praises that are being explained.

original: slob mas thal sbyar byas pas so //
analyzed: slob mas thal sbyar byas pas so //
translated: By the disciple with palms joined.

original: khams gsum pa las nges par grol //
analyzed: khams gsum pa las nges par grol //
translated: Definitely liberated from the three realms,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sgras gzung ba la sogs pa'i sems kyi gnyen po snang ba ye shes gsum mngon par brjod la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sgras gzung ba la sogs pa'i sems kyi gnyen po snang ba ye shes gsum mngon par brjod la /
translated: and so on. The antidote to the mind that is grasped by the words of the three realms and so on is the appearance of the three exalted wisdoms.

original: 'dis rnam par grol te bral ba ste bag chags med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis rnam par grol te bral ba ste bag chags med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: By this, one is liberated, free, because of the nature of being without latent tendencies.
